languages.text: "Генокрады, {name}. Так зовутся эти враги Человечества. Эти твари кусают жертв, вводят им свой ген и подчиняют разум. Точнее, связывают с одним общим разумом Выводка. Сами они не меняются, но их отпрыски несут печать нечеловеческой породы. Пасти, лишние руки, иногда и нечто худшее — монструозные выродки-ошибки. Но они прячут тех, кто не похож на людей, от чужих глаз. После нескольких поколений спаривания мутанты становятся похожи на людей, но затем их генетика делает виток, и вновь рождаются полноценные ксеносы, способные возобновить цикл заражения".

"Genestealers, {name}. That is what these enemies of Humanity are called. When such a creature bites its victim, it injects its gene into their body and dominates their mind. Or, more accurately, it binds it to the shared mind of the Brood. The victim undergoes no visible change, but their offspring will carry the brand of inhuman nature. Bestial maws, extra limbs, or something worse at times — horrific genetic outliers. However, the cult makes sure to keep any of their kind with unnatural appearance out of sight. After several generations, the mutants become practically indistinguishable from humans, but then something in their genes once more begets fully developed xenos capable of beginning the cycle of infestation anew."
languages.original_text: "Генокрады, {name}. Так зовутся эти враги Человечества. Эти твари кусают жертв, вводят им свой ген и подчиняют разум. Точнее, связывают с одним общим разумом Выводка. languages.text: “是基因窃取者，{name}，这就是这种人类之敌的名字。当这种怪物啮咬受害者时，它会将自己的基因注入受害者的身体，同时控制受害者的思想。或者，更准确地说，它会将受害者的思想与虫群紧密联系在一起。受害者不会发生明显变化，而他们的后代也会保持着人类的模样。这些怪物可能会长着恐怖的胃囊、额外的肢体，或者拥有更加糟糕、更加可怕的基因变异。不过，基因窃取者邪教会确保外貌古怪的成员不会出现在人类的视线之内。经过几代之后，那些怪物的外观将会变得与人类无法区分，而在这之后，他们的污染基因会再次繁育出完全发育的异形，从而开始新的感染循环。”
languages.original_text: "Genestealers, {name}. That is what these enemies of Humanity are called. When such a creature bites its victim, it injects its gene into their body and dominates their mind. Or, more accurately, it binds it to the shared mind of the Brood. The victim undergoes no visible change, but their offspring will carry the brand of inhuman nature. Bestial maws, extra limbs, or something worse at times — horrific genetic outliers. However, the cult makes sure to keep any of their kind with unnatural appearance out of sight. After several generations, the mutants become practically indistinguishable from humans, but then something in their genes once more begets fully developed xenos capable of beginning the cycle of infestation anew."

languages.text: «Genestealers, {name}. Así se llaman estos enemigos de la Humanidad. Cuando una de estas criaturas muerde a su víctima, su gen se inyecta en su organismo y toma el control de su mente. O más concretamente, la vincula a la mente compartida de la progenie. La víctima no experimenta ningún cambio físico apreciable, pero la naturaleza inhumana de la infección se manifiesta en su descendencia: fauces bestiales, extremidades adicionales y en ocasiones cosas aún peores que los convierten en espantos genéticos. Sin embargo, el culto procura ocultar a los miembros de aspecto más inhumano. Al cabo de varias generaciones los mutantes son casi indistinguibles de los humanos, pero algo en sus genes hace que engendren xenos totalmente desarrollados que comienzan de nuevo el ciclo de infestación».
languages.original_text: "Genestealers, {name}. That is what these enemies of Humanity are called. When such a creature bites its victim, it injects its gene into their body and dominates their mind. Or, more accurately, it binds it to the shared mind of the Brood. The victim undergoes no visible change, but their offspring will carry the brand of inhuman nature. Bestial maws, extra limbs, or something worse at times — horrific genetic outliers. However, the cult makes sure to keep any of their kind with unnatural appearance out of sight. After several generations, the mutants become practically indistinguishable from humans, but then something in their genes once more begets fully developed xenos capable of beginning the cycle of infestation anew."

Cuando una de estas criaturas muerde a su víctima, su gen se inyecta en su organismo y toma el control de su mente. O más concretamente, la vincula a la mente compartida de la progenie. La víctima no experimenta ningún cambio físico apreciable, pero la naturaleza inhumana de la infección se manifiesta en su descendencia: fauces bestiales, extremidades adicionales y en ocasiones cosas aún peores que los convierten en espantos genéticos. Sin embargo, el culto procura ocultar a los miembros de aspecto más inhumano. Al cabo de varias generaciones los mutantes son casi indistinguibles de los humanos, pero algo en sus genes hace que engendren xenos totalmente desarrollados que comienzan de nuevo el ciclo de infestación».

languages.text: 「ジーンスティーラー、{name}。人類の敵はそう呼ばれています。このようなクリーチャーが犠牲者に噛みつくと、その遺伝子を体内に注入し、彼らの精神を支配します。より正確には、巣族の共有する心と結びつけます。被害者には分かりやすい変化こそはありませんが、その子孫は非人間的な本性の烙印を押されるのです。獣のような顎、余分な手足、時にはもっと悪いものも。つまり恐ろしい遺伝的異常者になります。しかし、カルトは不自然な外見を持つ同類を人目に触れないように必死に隠します。数世代もたてば、変異体は人間とほとんど見分けがつかなくなりますが、将来的には、彼らの遺伝子の中の何かが、新たに侵入のサイクルを始めることができる完全に発達した異種族を再び生み出すのです」
languages.original_text: "Genestealers, {name}. That is what these enemies of Humanity are called. When such a creature bites its victim, it injects its gene into their body and dominates their mind. Or, more accurately, it binds it to the shared mind of the Brood. The victim undergoes no visible change, but their offspring will carry the brand of inhuman nature. Bestial maws, extra limbs, or something worse at times — horrific genetic outliers. However, the cult makes sure to keep any of their kind with unnatural appearance out of sight. After several generations, the mutants become practically indistinguishable from humans, but then something in their genes once more begets fully developed xenos capable of beginning the cycle of infestation anew."

languages.text: "Symbionten, {name}. So werden diese Feinde der Menschheit genannt. Beißt eine solche Kreatur ihr Opfer, injiziert es ihm seine Gene und übernimmt seinen Verstand. Oder, genauer gesagt, sie verbindet ihn mit dem kollektiven Verstand der Rotte. Das Opfer hat keine sichtbare Veränderungen, aber seine Nachkommen sind nicht mehr menschlich. Bestialische Mäuler, zusätzliche Gliedmaßen und schlimmer ... entsetzliche genetische Mutationen. Allerdings sorgt der Kult dafür, dass alle Mitglieder mit einem ungewöhnlichen Äußeren außer Sicht bleiben. Nach mehreren Generationen lassen sich die Mutanten von Menschen praktisch nicht mehr unterscheiden, aber dann bringt irgendetwas in ihren Genen voll entwickelte Xenos hervor und der Zyklus des Befalls beginnt von vorne."
languages.original_text: "Genestealers, {name}. That is what these enemies of Humanity are called. When such a creature bites its victim, it injects its gene into their body and dominates their mind. Or, more accurately, it binds it to the shared mind of the Brood. The victim undergoes no visible change, but their offspring will carry the brand of inhuman nature. Bestial maws, extra limbs, or something worse at times — horrific genetic outliers. However, the cult makes sure to keep any of their kind with unnatural appearance out of sight. After several generations, the mutants become practically indistinguishable from humans, but then something in their genes once more begets fully developed xenos capable of beginning the cycle of infestation anew."

Oder, genauer gesagt, sie verbindet ihn mit dem kollektiven Verstand der Rotte. Das Opfer hat keine sichtbare Veränderungen, aber seine Nachkommen sind nicht mehr menschlich. Bestialische Mäuler, zusätzliche Gliedmaßen und schlimmer ... entsetzliche genetische Mutationen. Allerdings sorgt der Kult dafür, dass alle Mitglieder mit einem ungewöhnlichen Äußeren außer Sicht bleiben. Nach mehreren Generationen lassen sich die Mutanten von Menschen praktisch nicht mehr unterscheiden, aber dann bringt irgendetwas in ihren Genen voll entwickelte Xenos hervor und der Zyklus des Befalls beginnt von vorne."

languages.text: « Les Genestealers, {name}. C'est ainsi qu'on appelle ces ennemis de l'humanité. Quand une créature de ce genre mord sa cible, elle lui inocule un gène qui lui permet de la contrôler mentalement. Ou, plus précisément, de la lier à la conscience collective du couvain. Si la victime ne subit pas de mutation apparente, la marque de leur nature non-humaine se manifeste par la suite, à travers sa progéniture. Une gueule bestiale, des membres supplémentaires, voire pire... Autant d'anomalies génétiques effroyables. Cependant, le culte veille à cacher soigneusement ces spécimens contrefaits. Au bout de plusieurs générations, les mutants deviennent presque impossibles à distinguer des humains, mais c'est alors que quelque chose dans leurs gènes engendre à nouveau des xénos parfaitement développés capables de relancer le cycle de l'infestation. »
languages.original_text: "Genestealers, {name}. That is what these enemies of Humanity are called. When such a creature bites its victim, it injects its gene into their body and dominates their mind. Or, more accurately, it binds it to the shared mind of the Brood. The victim undergoes no visible change, but their offspring will carry the brand of inhuman nature. Bestial maws, extra limbs, or something worse at times — horrific genetic outliers. However, the cult makes sure to keep any of their kind with unnatural appearance out of sight. After several generations, the mutants become practically indistinguishable from humans, but then something in their genes once more begets fully developed xenos capable of beginning the cycle of infestation anew."

languages.text: "Gençalanlar {name}. İnsanlığın bu düşmanları böyle bilinir. Bu tür bir yaratık, kurbanını ısırdığında kurbanın bedenine genetiğini aktararak zihnine hâkim olur. Hatta tam olarak zihnini Sürü'nün ortak zihnine bağlar. Kurban, görünürde hiçbir değişiklik yaşamaz. Çocuklar ise insan dışı tabiatının lekesini taşır. Canavarımsı ağızlar, ilave uzuvlar, hatta bazen çok daha beterleri... Dehşete düşüren genetik aykırılıklar görülür. Ancak tarikat, kendi soylarından tabiata aykırı görünümde olanları gözlerden uzak tutar. Birkaç nesil sonrasında mutantları insanlardan ayırt etmek neredeyse imkânsız bir hâl alır. Ancak sonrasında genlerindeki bir şey, istila döngüsünü yeniden başlatabilecek yetide tamamen gelişmiş zenolara hayat verir."
languages.original_text: "Genestealers, {name}. That is what these enemies of Humanity are called. When such a creature bites its victim, it injects its gene into their body and dominates their mind. Or, more accurately, it binds it to the shared mind of the Brood. The victim undergoes no visible change, but their offspring will carry the brand of inhuman nature.
